Document and Schema Properties¶

class ormchair.Document(document_data=None)¶

Base class that your model classes should extend

instanceToDict()¶

Convert the document class object to a dict

classmethod schemaToDict()¶

Export the class schema as a JSON-Schema compatible dict

class ormchair.StringProperty(**kwargs)¶

A string property of a class

Kwargs:
default (str): Default value required (bool): Is this a required (compulsory) property min_length (int): The minimum value length max_length (int): The maximum value length
class ormchair.NumberProperty(**kwargs)¶

A number property of a class

Kwargs: default (float): Default value required (bool): Is this a required (compulsory) property

minimum (float): The minimum value maximum (float): The maximum value
class ormchair.IntegerProperty(**kwargs)¶

An integer property of a class

Kwargs: default (int): Default value required (bool): Is this a required (compulsory) property

minimum (int): The minimum value maximum (int): The maximum value
class ormchair.BooleanProperty(**kwargs)¶

A boolean property of a class

Kwargs:
default (bool): Default value required (bool): Is this a required (compulsory) property
class ormchair.DictProperty(**kwargs)¶

Allows for composite properties

Kwargs:
default (dict): Default value required (bool): Is this a required (compulsory) property
class ormchair.ListProperty(property_instance, **kwargs)¶

Represents a list property

Args:
property_instance (Property): The list item property e.g. each item in the list is an instance of this
Kwargs:
default (list): Default value required (bool): Is this a required (compulsory) property
class ormchair.EmbeddedLinkProperty(linked_class, **kwargs)¶

Represents an embedded link to another document

Args:
linked_class (Document class): The Document class to create a link to
Kwargs:
default (Document): Default value required (bool): Is this a required (compulsory) property
class ormchair.LinkProperty(linked_class, reverse=None)¶

Property to link to other schemas

Args:
linked_class (Document class): The Document class to create a link to reverse (str): The name of the reverse property that will be created on the linked class e.g. the side of the relationship
class ormchair.Index(*args)¶

Used to create a view that allows documents to queried by properties of the class

Design Document and View¶

class ormchair.DesignDocument(document_data=None)¶

Base class that design document classes should extend

classmethod schemaToDict()¶

Export the class schema as a JSON-Schema compatible dict

class ormchair.View(default_value=None)¶

Represents a view

ormchair._id(id)¶

Decorator to set fixed id for a document class e.g. singleton documents. Decorated design document classes will be synced automatically when Database.sync() is called.
